title: css Zen Garden submission - 'CSS Co., Ltd.'
author: Benjamin Klemm

description.summary: A structured web design featuring a three-column layout with an educational focus, combining an orange sidebar, gray main content area, and clean white header
description.visual_style: Professional and organized with a consistent color scheme and thoughtful spacing, employing a structured grid system for content organization
description.emotional_impact: Creates a sense of stability and reliability through balanced composition and earthy, warm tones contrasted with neutral backgrounds
description.compositional_elements: Hierarchical information architecture with clearly defined sections, consistent heading treatments, and visual icons that provide navigational landmarks

artistic_context.style_influences: Web 2.0 design principles with elements of institutional/educational design patterns
artistic_context.visual_metaphors: Garden motif suggested by the floral-like icon elements and organic organization of content
